Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Major
b) Defect Observed: Servo valve spool sticking. Issue identified during pre-flight checks.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Wear beyond serviceable limits due to extended operational hours
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Brake System component. Testing
confirmed performance below acceptable limits.
c) Remedial Measures Repair damaged area using approved repair scheme
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Update technical documentation with lessons learned
d) Attributable Code: NFF - No Failure Found
Remarks: Complete defect analysis performed. Lessons learned documented.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Design assessment confirms component operated within specified limits. Recommend enhanced inspection protocol.
Date: 22/02/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Sqn Ldr H.S. Bhatia
